byline.contributor: Falih Hassan contributed reporting from Baghdad.

abstract: Iraqi forces retake handful of villages surrounding Mosul as anticipation builds over looming campaign to recover strategically and symbolically important city from Islamic State; disagreements over which forces will participate has been one factor delaying operation.
lead_paragraph: An American officer confirmed that four villages had been recaptured but said this did not necessarily mean a long-awaited assault on Mosul had begun.

headline.main: Iraq Retakes ISIS-Held Villages Outside Mosul
headline.print_headline: Iraq Retakes ISIS-Held Villages Outside Occupied City of Mosul

snippet: An American officer confirmed that four villages had been recaptured but said this did not necessarily mean a long-awaited assault on Mosul had begun.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
